short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Sonic The Hedgehog wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Sonic background. Sonic The Hedgehog wallpaper theme for game fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Sonic l'eriçó Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Sonic l'eriçó.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Sonic The Hedgehog mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Sonic The Hedgehog HD na pozadí.
short.da: Pindsvin Sonic Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Pindsvin Sonic tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Pindsvin Sonic fans.
short.de: Sonic the Hedgehog Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Sonic the Hedgehog Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Σόνικ ο σκαντζόχοιρος αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Σόνικ ο σκαντζόχοιρος.
short.es: La extensión Sonic el erizo Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo Sonic el erizo Wallpaper HD.
short.fi: Sonic The Hedgehog Wallpaper laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Sonic The Hedgehog taustakuvan HD-taustalla.
short.fr: L'extension Sonic l'hérisson change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Sonic l'hérisson. Pour les fans de Sonic l'hérisson.
short.it: L'estensione Sonic il riccio cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Sonic il riccio. Temi per i fan di Sonic il riccio.
short.ja: ソニックザヘッジホッグエクステンションは、ソニックザヘッジホッグ壁紙HD背景で新しいタブを変更します。ソニックザヘッジホッグファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 소닉 더 헤지혹 배경 화면 확장은 소닉 더 헤지혹 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 소닉 더 헤지혹 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Jeż Sonic zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Jeż Sonic HD. Motywy dla fanów Jeż Sonic.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Sonic O ouriço muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Sonic O ouriço. Para fãs do Sonic O ouriço.
short.sv: Sonic the Hedgehog förlängning ändra ny flik med Sonic the Hedgehog tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Sonic the Hedgehog-fans.
short.zh_CN: 刺猬索尼克壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为刺猬索尼克的背景壁纸。刺猬索尼克的主题。
short.zh_TW: 刺猬索尼克壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為刺猬索尼克的背景壁紙。刺猬索尼克粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Sonic The Hedgehog wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Sonic The Hedgehog background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Sonic The Hedgehog new tab.
